usage_rules: Use 'accent' (Orange) ONLY for high-priority actions (Buy, Sell, Alert).
Use 'muted-foreground' for labels and secondary data.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use the tinted variables provided.
Borders in tables should be subtle (opacity 40%).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-sm font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-sm font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-sm
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-sm

inputs.base: flex h-9 w-full rounded-sm border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: h-10 px-2 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

grids.dashboard_layout: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 md:p-8

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the font families (Manrope, Public Sans, JetBrains Mono) to tailwind.config.js.
2. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the contents of index.css :root and .dark with the values provided in the 'colors' section of this JSON.
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, apply the 'rounded-sm' class instead of 'rounded-md' or 'rounded-lg' to match the 'Soft Utility' aesthetic.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Mode B' grid strategy for the main dashboard page.
5. ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'phosphor-icons' if a more specific weight is needed.
6. CHARTS: Use 'recharts' (via Shadcn Charts) for all data visualization. Style them with the 'primary' and 'accent' colors.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
8. THEME: Implement a theme toggle (Light/Dark) in the top navigation bar.
9. TABLES: Use dense tables with sticky headers for inventory and order lists.
10. NOISE: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the background if possible (opacity 2-3%).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
